## `r en2fr("Tables", translate=french)`

(ref:spawn-index-a27-cap) Pacific Herring spawn index in tonnes, and
proportion of the spawn index by Section 
from `r  minor_end_yr-num_yrs_tab` to `r minor_end_yr` in the
Area 27 minor stock assessment region.
See Table \@ref(tab:spawn-index-hg) for description.

(ref:spawn-index-a27-cap-fr) Indice du frai en tonnes et
proportion de l’indice du frai par section pour
le hareng du Pacifique de `r  minor_end_yr-num_yrs_tab` à `r minor_end_yr` dans la
région d’évaluation des stocks mineur de la zone 27.
Voir le tableau \@ref(tab:spawn-index-hg) pour la description.

```{r spawn-index-a27}
spawn_index_by_area_table(ps[[en2fr("A27", french)]],
                          cap = ifelse(french,
                                       "(ref:spawn-index-a27-cap-fr)",
                                       "(ref:spawn-index-a27-cap)"),
                          first_yr = minor_end_yr-num_yrs_tab,
                          translate = french)
```

\afterpage{\clearpage}

## Figures

(ref:spawn-section-a27-cap) Time series of Pacific Herring spawn index
in thousands of tonnes (t) by Section
from `r minor_start_yr_plot` to `r minor_end_yr` in the
Area 27 minor stock assessment region.
See Figure \@ref(fig:spawn-section-cc) for description.

(ref:spawn-section-a27-cap-fr) Série chronologique de l’indice du frai
en milliers de tonnes pour le hareng du Pacifique par Section de
`r minor_start_yr_plot` à `r minor_end_yr` dans dans la
région d’évaluation des stocks mineur de la zone 27.
Voir la figure \@ref(fig:spawn-section-cc) pour la description.

```{r spawn-section-a27, fig.asp = 0.67, fig.cap = ifelse(french, "(ref:spawn-section-a27-cap-fr)", "(ref:spawn-section-a27-cap)")}
plot_spawn_section(
        model = NA,
        data_file = file.path(data_path, "spawn-yr-sec-a27.csv"),
        sections = NA,
        yr_range = c(minor_start_yr_plot, minor_end_yr),
        scale = FALSE,
        translate = french)
```

(ref:minor-catch-cap) Time series of total landed Pacific Herring catch
in thousands of tonnes (t) from `r minor_start_yr_plot` to `r minor_end_yr`
in the minor stock assessment regions.
See Figure \@ref(fig:major-catch) for description.

(ref:minor-catch-cap-fr) Série chronologique des prises totales débarquées en
milliers de tonnes (t) de hareng du Pacifique de
`r minor_start_yr_plot` à `r minor_end_yr` dans
les régions d’évaluation des stocks mineurs.
Voir la figure \@ref(fig:major-catch) pour la description.

```{r minor-catch, fig.asp = 0.45, fig.cap = ifelse(french, "(ref:minor-catch-cap-fr)", "(ref:minor-catch-cap)")}
plot_catch(df = minor_catch,
           xlim = c(minor_start_yr_plot, minor_end_yr),
           translate = french)
```

(ref:minor-wa-cap) Time series of Pacific Herring mean weight-at-age in kilograms (kg)
from `r minor_start_yr_plot` to `r minor_end_yr` in the minor stock assessment regions.
See Figure \@ref(fig:major-wa) for description.

(ref:minor-wa-cap-fr) Série chronologique du poids selon l’âge en kilogrammes (kg)
pour le hareng du Pacifique de `r minor_start_yr_plot` à `r minor_end_yr`
dans les régions d’évaluation des stocks mineurs.
Voir la figure \@ref(fig:major-wa) pour la description.

```{r minor-wa, fig.asp = 0.4, fig.cap = ifelse(french, "(ref:minor-wa-cap-fr)", "(ref:minor-wa-cap)")}
plot_wa(df = minor_wa,
        circle_age = age_highlight,
        xlim = c(minor_start_yr_plot, minor_end_yr),
        ylim = wa_ylim,
        n_roll = nRollWA,
        major = FALSE,
        translate = french)
```

(ref:minor-pa-cap) Time series of Pacific Herring proportion-at-age from
`r minor_start_yr_plot` to `r minor_end_yr` in the minor stock assessment regions.
See Figure \@ref(fig:major-pa) for description.

(ref:minor-pa-cap-fr) Série chronologique de la proportion selon l’âge
pour le hareng du Pacifique de `r minor_start_yr_plot` à `r minor_end_yr`
dans les régions d’évaluation des stocks mineurs.
Voir la figure \@ref(fig:major-pa) pour la description.

```{r minor-pa, fig.asp = 0.45, fig.cap = ifelse(french, "(ref:minor-pa-cap-fr)", "(ref:minor-pa-cap)")}
plot_pa(df = minor_pa,
        age_plus = age_plus,
        conf = ci_level,
        xlim = c(minor_start_yr_plot, minor_end_yr),
        ylim = c(1, age_plus),
        translate = french)

```

(ref:minor-spawn-index-cap) Time series of Pacific Herring spawn index
in thousands of tonnes (t) from `r minor_start_yr_plot` to `r minor_end_yr`
in the minor stock assessment regions.
See Figure \@ref(fig:major-spawn-index) for description.

(ref:minor-spawn-index-cap-fr) Série chronologique de l’indice du frai en milliers
de tonnes pour le hareng du Pacifique de `r minor_start_yr_plot` à `r minor_end_yr`
dans les régions d’évaluation des stocks mineurs.
Voir la figure \@ref(fig:major-spawn-index) pour la description.

```{r minor-spawn-index, fig.asp = 0.45, fig.cap = ifelse(french, "(ref:minor-spawn-index-cap-fr)", "(ref:minor-spawn-index-cap)")}
plot_spawn_ind(df = minor_surv,
               yr_range = c(minor_start_yr_plot, minor_end_yr),
               new_surv_yr = new_surv_yr,
               translate = french)
```

(ref:a10-map-cap) Sections (Sec) included in the Pacific Herring special area,
Area 10 (A10).
Note that special areas are not stock assessment regions (SARs);
therefore they are excluded from regular monitoring and analyses.
In addition, note that A10 is a subset of the Central Coast Sections that are
outside the SAR boundary.
Units: kilometres (km).

(ref:a10-map-cap-fr) Sections (Sec) incluses dans la zone spéciale
du hareng du Pacifique, zone 10 (Z10).
Notez que les zones spéciales ne sont pas des régions d'évaluation des stocks (RES);
elles sont donc exclues de la surveillance et des analyses régulières.
De plus, notez que Z10 est un sous-ensemble des Sections de la côte centrale
qui sont en dehors des limites de la RES.
Unités: kilomètres (km).

```{r a10-map, fig.cap = ifelse(french, "(ref:a10-map-cap-fr)", "(ref:a10-map-cap)"), out.width = "100%"}
knitr::include_graphics(here::here(ifelse(french, "figures/A10_fr.png", "figures/A10.png")))
```
